name: Company B
description:
*Game still WIP I'm planning to at least add SFX and a tutorial *

Game made in 10 days for the VimJam2 with the Requirement: Boss and the Theme: On The Edge. My game fits because the player is a boss in a company and they influence votes that are on the edge.

Music: Abstraction

Newspaper Font: Chomsky

Other Fonts: Thaleah and Ikkle Font Pack(little conquest)

Art: Aseprite

Engine: Godot
